meanings.definition: A person who practices magic; a sorcerer or magician.
meanings.sent1: The wizard cast a spell to make the flowers bloom.
meanings.sent2: The children were amazed by the wizard's magic tricks.
meanings.sent3: The wizard accidentally turned himself into a frog while practicing a new spell.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to calm the wild animals made her seem like a wizard of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The wizard's cloak shimmered with a thousand colors as he raised his wand.

meanings.definition: A person who is very skilled or knowledgeable in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: The computer wizard fixed my laptop in no time.
meanings.sent2: She is a marketing wizard and always comes up with creative ideas.
meanings.sent3: The baking wizard in our family can turn simple ingredients into delicious treats.
meanings.sent4: He was a financial wizard, turning small investments into great fortunes.
meanings.sent5: The gardening wizard knew exactly how to make plants thrive in any soil.
